name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark Knight Ablaze: Batman in Flames Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ignite your browser with Batman in flames, featuring dynamic visuals, shortcuts, and a sleek, minimalist design.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Witness the Dark Knight surrounded by roaring flames in a powerful visual display.
Minimalist Design: Enjoy a sleek, intuitive interface for seamless use.
Clock and Date: Keep track of time and date effortlessly.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Instantly navigate to your favorite websites.
Search Bar: Browse with ease using the integrated search tool.
More Extension: Enhance your experience with advanced features.
It searches using the search engine selected by the user.
